Position.Title: Student Performance & Events Off
Position.BriefRoleStatement: Supporting Public Schools NSW personnel through the development, coordination and delivery of performances and events.
Position.StatementOfDuties:
• Contributing to unit-wide programs and planning, as required.
  • Coordinating the development and delivery of event project plans including production and operation schedules, risk management, stage management plans and copyright.
  • Coordinating the production, staging and management of events, including facilitating the needs and requirements of all stakeholders.
  • Liaising with key stakeholders, including educational services teams, directorates, other government agencies and industry professionals relating to the production and management of events.
  • Preparing budgets, action plans, briefings, website materials and reports relating to the production and management of events.
  • Supervising the work of support staff, casual staff and tutors engaged for events and productions.
  • Working as a member of diverse teams to produce and stage large and small scale events in a K-12 environment.
